titleproper.value: Guide to the Edmund V. Bragdon Collection <num>MC 329</num>

author.value: Collection processed by Jennifer E. Neal

creation.value: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace <date>2019-06-24T15:52:53</date>

abstract.value: Edmund V. Bragdon, a graduate of New York University (NYU), collected memorabilia related to his time as a student at NYU. Materials include event programs, dance cards, and a photograph of students taken in 1904.

p.value: Access to the Edmund V. Bragdon Collection is restricted until it has been arranged and described by an archivist.
Identification of item, date; Edmund V. Bragdon Collection; MC 329; box number; folder number or item identifier; New York University Archives, New York University.
Materials donated by Virginia Bragdon Easton in circa 1997. The accession number associated with this collection is 97.004.
This collection doucuments Edmund V. Bragdon's time as a student at New York University (NYU). Materials include event programs, dance cards, and a photograph of students taken in 1904.
